allow:
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" release create v0.1.0 --title "Release v0.1.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
First release of BitTorrent Blocker - a high-performance DPI-based BitTorrent traffic blocker for Linux.

## Features

- **Multi-Protocol Detection**: TCP and UDP BitTorrent traffic
- **Deep Packet Inspection**: 11 complementary detection methods
- **Protocol Coverage**:
  - Standard BitTorrent handshakes
  - MSE/PE Encryption \(Message Stream Encryption\)
  - LSD \(Local Service Discovery/BEP 14\)
  - Extended Protocol \(BEP 10\)
  - FAST Extension \(BEP 6\)
  - UDP tracker protocol
  - DHT \(Distributed Hash Table/BEP 5\)
  - PEX \(Peer Exchange/BEP 11\)
  - uTP \(Micro Transport Protocol/BEP 29\)
  - HTTP-based BitTorrent \(WebSeed, Bitcomet\)
  - SOCKS5 proxy unwrapping
  - Entropy analysis for encrypted traffic

## Installation

### NixOS / Nix \(Recommended\)

\\`\\`\\`bash
# Install to your profile
nix profile install github:spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker

# Or try without installing
nix run github:spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker
\\`\\`\\`

Binary cache available at https://btblocker.cachix.org

See [docs/NIX_INSTALLATION.md]\(https://github.com/spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker/blob/main/docs/NIX_INSTALLATION.md\) for complete installation guide.

### From Source

\\`\\`\\`bash
git clone https://github.com/spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker
cd BitTorrentBlocker
make build
\\`\\`\\`

## Documentation

- [Quick Start Guide for NixOS]\(https://github.com/spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker/blob/main/docs/QUICK_START_NIXOS.md\)
- [NixOS Deployment Guide]\(https://github.com/spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker/blob/main/docs/NIXOS_DEPLOYMENT.md\)
- [Cachix Setup]\(https://github.com/spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker/blob/main/docs/CACHIX_SETUP.md\)

## Test Coverage

- **76%+** code coverage
- **165+** unit test cases
- **16** performance benchmarks
- Integration tests with Docker
- E2E tests with NixOS

## Performance

Benchmark results \(AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D\):
- BitTorrent detection: 4.1 ns/op, 0 allocs/op
- UDP Tracker check: 2.4 ns/op, 0 allocs/op
- HTTP traffic analysis: 565 ns/op, 0 allocs/op
- Cached IP ban: 20.6 ns/op, 0 allocs/op

## What''s Changed

Initial release with comprehensive BitTorrent detection and blocking capabilities.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spaiter/BitTorrentBlocker/commits/v0.1.0
EOF
\)")
